I'm trying to get the http status code out of arc records to record in
my cdx index, but ARCRecordMetaData.getStatusCode() never returns
anything other than null.  I can look in the arc files and see the
status codes in each record, so I know they're there.  

What I'm trying to do is identify pages that redirected by catching
the appropriate status codes.

Any ideas?

Thanks,
Rob Eger
Local Matters, Inc.
